text: Valdete Idrizi (born 1973) is the director of an NGO in Mitrovica that helps young people, women, and displaced people. In 2008 she received an International Women of Courage Award. For six years prior to 2008, Community- Building Mitrovica was the only organization in Mitrovica which encouraged reconciliation and rebuilding of relationships between ethnic Albanians and Serbs. == Life == Idrizi was born in Mitrovica, a city in Kosovo. She went to the University of Pristina in Mitrovica. == References == Category:Women who received the International Women of Courage Award Category:Living people Category:1973 births Category:Kosovan politicians Category:Serbian politicians Category:Women's rights activists Category:Kosovo Albanians
title: Valdete Idrizi
